name: Symrise - SymProBiome™ Platform
description: Symrise offers the SymProBiome™ research platform for skin, scalp, oral, and gut health microbiome solutions. The platform includes microbiome-friendly preservatives, UV filters, and innovative actives that protect products while maintaining skin's natural flora balance. Products include SymReboot® L19, SymDeo® B125, Frescolat® ML, Crinipan® PMC Green, SymGuard® CD, and SymReboot® OC.
notes: Major industry leader in microbiome science with comprehensive research platform covering multiple microbiome applications. Revolutionary approach to cosmetic science shifting from 'kill all bacteria' to 'nurture beneficial bacteria'.
